items.name: var types: [NSPasteboard.PasteboardType]
items.desc: An array of UTI strings of the data types supported by the receiver.

items.name: func availableType(from: [NSPasteboard.PasteboardType]) -> NSPasteboard.PasteboardType?
items.desc: Returns from a given array of types the first type contained in the pasteboard item, according to the ordering of types.

items.name: func setDataProvider(NSPasteboardItemDataProvider, forTypes: [NSPasteboard.PasteboardType]) -> Bool
items.desc: Sets the data provider for the specified types.

items.name: func setData(Data, forType: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType) -> Bool
items.desc: Sets the value for a specified type as an NSData object.

items.name: func setString(String, forType: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType) -> Bool
items.desc: Sets the value for a specified type as a string.

items.name: func setPropertyList(Any, forType: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType) -> Bool
items.desc: Sets the value for a specified type as a property list.

items.name: func data(forType: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType) -> Data?
items.desc: Returns the value for the specified type as an NSData object.

items.name: func string(forType: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType) -> String?
items.desc: Returns the value for the specified type as a string.

items.name: func propertyList(forType: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the value for the specified type as a property list.
